name: qr-attendance
description: Your web application will: 1. **User Registration**: Students will register themselves by providing personal details including their university ID (with a QR code), and this registration will go to the admin's dashboard for approval. 2. **Admin Approval**: Admin can approve or disapprove the registration, with approved data stored in Google Sheets. 3. **Attendance Management**: Admin can scan students' QR codes to mark attendance and record it in the Google Sheet. 4. **Registration Management**: Admin controls when registration is open or closed. 5. **Student Search**: Admin can search for specific student data using their ID number.
